summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2019 LINCOLN NAUTILUS. UPON STARTING THE VEHICLE, THE INSTRUMENT PANEL WENT COMPLETELY BLANK AND FAILED TO FUNCTION. THE CONTACT DROVE TO STIVERS FORD LINCOLN (4000 EASTERN BLVD, MONTGOMERY, AL 36116, 334-613-5000) WHERE THEY INFORMED THE MANUFACTURER OF THE FAILURE. THE MANUFACTURER REPLIED THAT THEY WERE UNAWARE OF THE DEFECT. THE VEHICLE WAS RETURNED TO THE CONTACT UNREPAIRED. THE CONTACT ASSOCIATED THE FAILURE WITH NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 19V076000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM); HOWEVER, THE DEALER STATED THAT THE VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED. THE DEALER OFFERED NO FURTHER ASSISTANCE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 3,500.
